content: this cozy crochet blanket works up in no time with super soft bernat forever fleece tweed worked from side to side a classic ribbed texture is created by working simple half_double_crochet stitches through the horizontal bar from the row below tipping the top of the row forward to showcase the beautiful chain completely reversible this pattern is a meditative crochet project you ll love materials bernat® forever fleece tweeds™ 8 8 oz/250 g 158 yds/145 m rolling sky tweed 79015 10 balls or 1566 yds/1437 m measurements approx 46½ x 55 118 x 139 5 cm
